issue.title: [Rust] Allow configuring flight IPC with IpcWriteOptions
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9981](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9981). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We have introduced an IPC write option, but we use the default for the arrow-flight crate, which is not ideal. Change this to allow configuring writer options.
